title: Here's a reading list of 20 articles up to 2023 that focus on indirectly supervised natural language processing (NLP). These articles cover a range of topics including weak supervision
note: semi-supervised learning, self-supervised learning, and other forms of indirect supervision in NLP.

title: **"Weakly Supervised Learning of Semantic Parsers for Mapping Instructions to Actions"**
**"Snorkel: Rapid Training Data Creation with Weak Supervision"** - Ratner, Alexander, et al
**"Learning from Noisy Labels with Deep Neural Networks: A Survey"** - Song, Hwanjun, et al
**"Self-Training with Noisy Student improves ImageNet classification"** - Xie, Qizhe, et al
**"Unsupervised Machine Translation Using Monolingual Corpora Only"** - Lample, Guillaume, et al

author.literal: **"Semi-Supervised Sequence Learning"** - Dai, Andrew M., and Quoc V. Le.

title: Pre-training of Deep Bidirectional Transformers for Language Understanding"**
**"Noisy Student Training: An Efficient Semi-Supervised Learning Method"** - Xie, Qizhe, et al
**"MixMatch: A Holistic Approach to Semi-Supervised Learning"**
Unsupervised Data Augmentation for Consistency Training"** - Xie, Qizhe, et al
**"FixMatch: Simplifying Semi-Supervised Learning with Consistency and Confidence"**
**"Self-Supervised Learning of Pretext-Invariant Representations"** - Misra, Ishan, et al
**"Learning Transferable Visual Models From Natural Language Supervision"** - Radford, Alec, et al
**"Self-Supervised Learning: Generative or Contrastive"** - Chen, Ting, et al
**"Weakly Supervised Learning for Neural Machine Translation"** - Zhang, Jiajun, et al
**"Self-Training for End-to-End Speech Recognition"**
**"Self-Supervised Learning of Audio Representations from Permutations"** - Lee, Honglak, et al
**"Self-Supervised Learning of Pretext-Invariant Representations"** - Misra, Ishan, et al
